channel.title: - Articles
channel.description: The guidance through your Artificial Intelligence journey

item.title: Tracking 3D objects with Lidar and Camera
item.description: Integrating Lidar Point Clouds with Camera Images to compute Time To Collision (TTC)

item.title: Lidar Obstacles Detection
item.description: In this project, we create a simple 3d highway enviroment using Point Cloud Library for exploring self-driving car sensors.

item.title: Redes Neurais Convolucionais
item.description: Nesse post, vamos abordar um dos principais tópicos dentro da área de redes neurais, um dos pilares de Deep Learning e muito utilizado para resolver problemas de visão computacional: as Redes Neurais Convolucionais.

item.title: Image Captioning
item.description: In this project, we used a dataset of image-caption pairs to train a CNN-RNN model to automatically generate captions from images.

item.title: Landmark Detection & Robot Tracking (SLAM)
item.description: In this project, we’ll be localizing a robot in a 2D grid world. The basis for simultaneous localization and mapping (SLAM) is to gather information from a robot’s sensors and motions over time, and then use information about measurements and motion to re-construct a map of the world.

item.title: Facial Keypoint Detection
item.description: This project will be all about defining and training a convolutional neural network to perform facial keypoint detection, and using computer vision techniques to transform images of faces.

item.title: Gradient Descent, Feedforward and Backpropagation
item.description: Let’s see three fundamentals concepts of Deep Learning: the Gradient Descent, Feedforward and Backpropagation steps.

item.title: AI May Highlights
item.description: Top 5 AI News and Trends I came across in May 2020.

item.title: Introduction to Neural Networks
item.description: Learn the main concepts behind Neural Networks, one of Deep Learning’s pillars.

item.title: Batch vs Mini-batch vs Stochastic Gradient Descent with Code Examples
item.description: What is the difference between these three Gradient Descent variants?

item.title: How to get started on Spacenet Challenge 6 using CosmiQ Baseline
item.description: Let’s implement the SpaceNet Baseline to join the Spacenet Challenge 6 and extract buildings footprints from satellite imagery.

item.title: Predicting Buyers for Food Delivery Platforms
item.description: This project has the objective to create a Machine Learning Model to predict whether a user that just registered will buy or not. Predicting such action could influence from user experience until predicting demands for restaurants.

item.title: Destaques de Maio em IA
item.description: As 5 principais notícias e tendências da IA que cruzei em maio de 2020.

item.title: Introdução a Redes Neurais
item.description: Aprenda os principais conceitos por trás das Redes Neurais, um dos pilares do Deep Learning.
